938.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, even without notification to the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

991.title: Disqus will help you react to others infringing on your copyright

tosdr.case: they will help you react to others infringing on your copyright
tosdr.tldr: Disqus will respond to alleged infringement notices that comply with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.
